title: Teleport summoner shows no cooldown on the scoreboard unlike the rest of the spells
body: Noticed this about a week ago when request a tele from my top laner and thinking he had it because it didnt have the cooldown overlay.

replies.body: Fixed in the next upcoming patch (5.16).

WHILE I HAVE YOU HERE. I have a bug with my client among my friends it seems to be specific to me. My game times are bugged, when my friends hover over my name it will show show obnoxious amounts of time. (in game for 15 minutes my friends ask my why ive been in game for 173 minutes)
Coupled with this bug I cannot see any one of my friends time in game. It has persisted for several months and I have tried repairing the client before its not a gameplay hindrance which is why I have not posted about it until now. But if it could be looked into in some way that would be great.
